readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings. Since you didn't learn that reading for 粉 with the kanji, here's a mnemonic to help you out. What sort of people like <vocabulary>wheat flour</vocabulary> the most? <reading>子</reading>! 子 like wheat flour the most since it is both fun to eat and to play with. Silly 子, wheat flour is a food, not a toy.
